Evernote for Windows 4.6.5.8353 GA Release Notes

  • Improvements:
    • xAuth allows userse to remain authenticated in a more durable manner.
    • Users required to enter password to sign in while offline
  • Fixes:
    • Fix for changing focus
    • Fix for issue with tab key
    • Fix for saved search term being added to previous filter
    • Fix for issue with tab key causing font change

Evernote for Windows 4.6.3.8096 Public GA Release Notes

  • This update addresses a security issue that requires you to reset your password. Details on blog.evernote.com
  • このアップデートは、セキュリティ問題に対処するものであり、ユーザのみなさまにパスワードの再設定をしていただく必要があります。詳細は http://blog.evernote.com/jp/ をご参照下さい。
  • 此版更新解决了可能的安全隐患，请务必为你的帐户重新设置登录密码。更多详情请访问blog.evernote.com
  • 이번 업데이트는 보안에 관련한 업데이트로 패스워드 재설정이 필요합니다. 자세한 내용은 http://evernote-ko.tumblr.com에서 확인해 주세요.
  • Dieses Update adressiert eine Sicherheitsmassnahme, welche die Rücksetzung Ihres Passwortes erfordert. Details finden Sie unter http://evernote-de.tumblr.com/
  • Esta actualización resuelve un tema de seguridad que requiere reajustar su contraseña. Mas detalles en el blog.evernote.com
  • Это обновление устраняет проблемы безопасности. Вы должны изменить свой пароль. Подробности на blog.evernote.com/ru
  • Esta atualização trata de uma questão de segurança requerendo que você redefina sua senha. Detalhes em http://evernote-br.tumblr.com
  • Questo aggiornamento contiene delle direttive di sicurezza che rendono necessario resettare il proprio password. Ulteriori informazioni su http://evernote-it.tumblr.com
  • Cette mise à jour corrige un problème de sécurité qui nécessite que vous réinitialisiez votre mot de passe. Plus d'informations sur http://evernote-fr.tumblr.com
  • 此版更新解決了可能的安全隱患，請務必為你的帳戶重新設置登錄密碼。更多詳情請訪問http://evernote-tw.tumblr.com
  • Denna uppdatering förstarker säkerheten och kräver att du byter lösenord. Mer information finns på blog.evernote.com
  • Improvements:
    • Clipper for Outlook 2013 (32 bit)
    • Romanian language support added
  • Fixes:
    • Misc IE clipping bug fixes
    • Fix for empty "Attachment.bin" being created when reattaching a file
    • Fix for copy & pasting a PDF to another application only working when "view as attachment" is selected
    • Client will now use a business email address when users check the 'CC Myself' checkbox when emailing a business note
    • Bug fix for moving notes back and forth between various Business Notebooks
    • Numerous drag and drop fixes

Evernote for Windows 4.6.2.7927 GA Release Notes

  • Improvements:
    • Windows Client will use Business email address when emailing business notes. You can set your business email address on the web.
    • Skitch Screen capture is now Shift+PrintScreen instead of Alt+PrintScreen
  • Fixes:
    • Bug fix for sync error when you leave a business notebook via the Admin Console
    • Improved stability for moving notes from personal notebooks to business notebooks
    • Bug fix for permissions not updating when changing from View Only to View & Modify Notes access
    • Improved stability when tagging multiple notes
    • Several sync fixes involving Evernote Business & business tags

    • Fix for migrating notes from personal to business notebooks
    • Fix for tagging when multiselecting notes

Evernote for Windows 4.6.1.7860 GA Release Notes

  • Improvements:
    • Ability to copy or move notes into Business notebooks.
    • New Internet Explorer Clipper for IE 9 & above. Includes Evernote Business support, Article detection, selecting of notebooks & tags while clipping
    • Import folder now works with Business Notebooks & Joined Notebooks
    • Fixes:
      • Crash fix for crashes after upgrade or install
      • Fix for inability to drag a note to a business tag
      • Fixed various sync errors
      • Bug fix for your tags and tags from joined notebook showing up in all stacks

    Evernote for Windows 4.6.1.7772 RC Release Notes

    • Improvements:

      • Admin Console available in Help Menu for Evernote Business admins
    • Fixes:
      • Fix for sync issues after adding, deleting or editing tags in Business notebooks
      • Misc bug fixes

    Evernote for Windows 4.6.1.7752 Beta 2 Release Notes

    • Improvements:
      • Ability to move notes into Business notebooks
      • New Internet Explorer Clipper for IE 9 & above. Includes Evernote Business support, Article detection, selecting of notebooks & tags while clipping

      • Business notebooks now sync immediately after you join them via the Business Library
      • Bug fix for business tags not being properly saved
      • Bug fix for your tags and tags from joined notebook showing up in all stacks

    Evernote for Windows 4.6.1.7705 Beta 1 Release Notes

    Evernote for Windows 4.6.0.7670 GA Release Notes

    • Improvements:
      • Removed "Account" & "Shared" tabs
      • Notebooks previously under Shared tab (aka Joined Notebooks) are now underneath your notebooks
      • Ability to create stacks with Joined Notebooks. You can create stacks that include your notebooks and joined notebooks.
      • Ability to drag Notebooks, All My Notes &
      • Improved indenting of Notebooks to conserve horizontal space
      • Misc Design modifications in left panel
    • Fixes:
      • Issue with tags disappearing, and reappearing after resizing left panel
      • Fix for Leave Notebook randomly being disabled
      • Misc bug fixes

    Evernote for Windows 4.6.0.7640 Beta 2 Release Notes

    • Fixes:
      • New installer components
      • Issue with tags disapperaing, and reappearing after resizing left panel
      • Fix for Leave Notebook randomly being disabled
    • Known Issue:
      • Broken Internet Explorer Clipper

    Evernote for Windows 4.6.0.7610 Beta 1 Release Notes

    Evernote for Windows 4.5.10.7472 GA Release Notes

    • If you've already upgraded to 4.5.10 (7470), there is no need to upgrade to this version (4.5.10.7472)
    • Fixes issues with using special charaters in a note. (Notes would appear blank, but the original content was not deleted)
    • Skitch Integration: (If Skitch for Windows Desktop is installed)
      • Skitch is available at evernote.com/skitch & yinxiang.com/skitch
      • Notes created in Skitch have a pink header
        • The pencil on the right allows marking up with Skitch and saves changes back in Evernote
      • Right click menu for images now include "Markup with Skitch" option
      • Ability to create a New Skitch Note. Keyboard shortcut is Ctrl+Shift+S
      • Allows editing of titles on Skitch notes
        • Will start screenshot functionality
        • After screenshot is taken, the screenshot will be opened in Skitch for markup
        • After marking up and exiting Skitch, the screenshot is updated you'll have created a Skitch note, available in Evernote
    • Other Fixes:
      • Fixed repeated sync attempts after disconnecting from network
      • Fixed IME editor for CJK languages to properly delete/cancel
      • Bug fix for upgrade bug in 4.5.10.7470

    Evernote for Windows 4.5.9.7407 RC 2 Release Notes

    • Improvements:
      • Allows editing of titles on Skitch notes

    Evernote for Windows 4.5.9.7407 RC Release Notes

    • Improvements:
      • New flow for sharing notebooks. Dialog pops up with sharing options and helps keep your context instead of taking up the whole screen.
    • Fixes:
      • Fixes to the any: modifier in searches
      • Search is insensitive to diacritical characters
      • Fix for tags only showing up partially in the note info panel

    Evernote for Windows 4.5.9.7355 Beta 1 Release Notes

    • Fixes:

      Evernote for Windows 4.5.4.6498 GA Release Notes

      • New Login/Registration page
      • Updated EULA for 2012
      • Numerous bullet point bug fixes
      • Added support for dragging and dropping attachments/images to MS-Office apps
      • Find for PDFs starts from the current page of the PDF
      • Notebooks sync upon sharing if the notebook hasn't been synced before
      • Copy Note Link Starts Sync if a note hasn't been synced before
      • Sync on Exit checkbox under Tools >> Options
      • Fixed Find in PDF bug where only first term is highlighted
      • Fixed limit on notebooks/stacks in dropdown
      • Fixed issue where notes print at larger font size than expected
      • Removed non-functional multi-select feature that was in the previous GA

        Evernote for Windows 4.4 Release Notes

        • Added support for note links, create links to individual notes that can be plasted within Evernote and other applications
        • Added the ability to browse history in the main and single note view with back and forward toolbar controls and buttons shortcuts
        • Added Snippet view (replacing Mixed view) which provides more relevant note information at a glance
        • Added support for copying notes within a notebook and between notebooks
        • Added support for copying to and from shared notebooks
        • Added Drag and Drop support in the note editor
        • Added Note menu to the main menu bar
        • Added toggling between PDF preview and attachment view by right-clicking on the PDF
        • Added note export wizard including exporting multiple HTML pages as an interconnectted site
        • Improved handling of styled text
        • Added URL preview in the status bar
        • Improved note loading performance
        • Added warnings when opening potentially risky file attachments

        Evernote for Windows 4.3.1

        • Improved installer on non-US devices
        • Fixed problem with scrollbar not updating after resizing the window
        • Added dialog for Note word and resource count

        Evernote for Windows 4.3

        • Share individual notes on Facebook, Twitter, email or via a direct URL
        • Share notebooks without leaving the application
        • View notebooks that others have shared in the new Shared tab
        • Displays word and character counts for notes in the status bar, available in the View menu
        • Added Find and Replace within notes
        • Spell check adds "Change all" option
        • Improved handling of indents in the text editor
        • Ads are displayed in the user's preferred language
        • Default fonts are selected based on the user's preferred language
        • Fixed created notes with attachments from ENScript
        • Bug fixes
